page.shortlink: api namespace Active Directory User ActiveDirectory User

description.p: The WindowsServices::ActiveDirectory::User object contains properties and methods available for working with an Active Directory user.

There are many user account attributes available as properties on this object. If any other attributes are required, the list of those attributes must be set on the WindowsServices::ActiveDirectory::Domain object's AdditionalUserAttributeNames property before the WindowsServices::ActiveDirectory::Domain::GetUser() method is called. The GetAttribute() method with the attribute name can then be used to get one of the additional attributes not available as property.

property.name: Name
property.description: Name is the name of the Active Directory user. Read Only.

property.name: Description
property.description: Description is the description of the Active Directory user. Read Only.

property.name: DistinguishedName
property.description: DistinguishedName is the LDAP distinguished name of the user. Read Only.

property.name: Sid
property.description: Sid is the Windows security id of the user. Read Only.

property.name: DisplayName
property.description: DisplayName is the friendly of the user. Read Only.

property.name: SamAccountName
property.description: SamAccountName is the SAM account name for the user. Read Only

property.name: Guid
property.description: Guid is the guid for the user. Read Only

property.name: Roles
property.description: A *[link:crlf@CRLF Function]* delimited list of the user's roles. Read Only

property.name: EmailAddress
property.description: An array of users that belong to the group.

property.name: EmployeeId
property.description: EmployeeId is the employee ie for the user. Read Only.

property.name: AccountExpirationDate
property.description: AccountExpirationDate is date/time the user's account expires. Read Only.

property.name: AccountLockoutTime
property.description: AccountLockoutTime is a date/time the user's account was locked out. Read Only.

property.name: AccountLockedOut
property.description: AccountLockedOut indicates whether the user's account is locked out or not. Read Only.

property.name: BadLogonCount
property.description: BadLogonCount is the number of invalid attempts logging into the user's account. Read Only.

property.name: DelegationPermitted
property.description: DelegationPermitted indicates whether or not this user's account may be delegated. Read Only.

property.name: Enabled
property.description: Enabled indicates whether this user's account is enabled or not. Read Only.

property.name: GivenName
property.description: GivenName for the user. Read Only.

property.name: HomeDirectory
property.description: HomeDirectory is the home directory for this user's account. Read Only.

property.name: HomeDrive
property.description: HomeDrive is the home drive for this user's account. Read Only.

property.name: LastBadPasswordAttempt
property.description: LastBadPasswordAttempt is the date/time of the last invalid login attempt. Read Only.

property.name: LastLogon
property.description: LastLogon is is the date/time of the last successful login. Read Only.

property.name: LastPasswordSet
property.description: LastPasswordSet is the date/time for the last time the password was set for the user. Read Only.

property.name: MiddleName
property.description: MiddleName is the middle name of the user. Read Only.

property.name: PasswordNeverExpires
property.description: PasswordNeverExpires indicates whether the user's password can expire or not. Read Only.

property.name: ScriptPath
property.description: ScriptPath is the script path for this user account. Read Only.

property.name: SmartcardLogonRequired
property.description: SmartcardLogonRequired indicates whether smartcard login is required or not. Read Only.

property.name: Surname
property.description: Surname is the surname of the user. Read Only.

property.name: UserCannotChangePassword
property.description: UserCannotChangePassword indicates whether the user can change the account's password or not. Read Only.

property.name: UserPrincipalName
property.description: UserPrincipalName is Active Directory principle name of the user. Read Only.

property.name: VoiceTelephoneNumber
property.description: VoiceTelephoneNumber is the telephone number of the user. Read Only.
